snippet: The United States Department of Justice has opened a criminal investigation into the death of an inmate with mental illness who died of thirst after being held in solitary confinement for 35 days.
abstract: Justice Department opens criminal investigation into death of Michael Anthony Kerr, North Carolina inmate with mental illness who died of thirst after being held in solitary confinement for 35 days.
lead_paragraph: The United States Department of Justice has opened a criminal investigation into the death of an inmate with mental illness who died of thirst after being held in solitary confinement for 35 days.
